pages.text: Typically found in dense forests, owls are famed as a symbol of wisdom.

Despite their cumbersome appearance, owls are powerful fliers and lethal hunters: they prefer smaller game, like rabbits, but have also been known to take chickens from unwitting farmers.$(br2)Owls find the best companion in worldly witches who travel often.
It's said that familiarized
witches are attuned to the wind, making their work with a broom something to behold.$(2br)$(o)How many licks?
